facultyDetails.name: Gagan Pratap Sir
facultyDetails.bio: Gagan Pratap Sir – 7+ years
facultyDetails.description: Maths Expert for SSC, Railway & State Exams , Also known as the “Selection King”, Gagan Sir has guided and inspired lakhs of students across India. With his unique teaching style—concept clarity + shortcut tricks—he has given thousands of selections in SSC CGL, CHSL, CPO, MTS, GD, RRB NTPC, Group D, and State-level exams.
